nodes.html: The Journal of Tourism Analysis: Revista de Análisis Turístico (JTA) aims to be an open access forum for scientific exchange and knowledge transfer on tourism. The journal will publish 2 issues per annum and will include topics on but not limited to:

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 16.1

nodes.html: an open access forum for scientific exchange and knowledge transfer on tourism

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 16.1

nodes.html: • Understanding tourism from theoretical and conceptual contributions, methodological approach and empirical research

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 16.1

nodes.html: • Promoting studies with critical points of view and perspectives.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 16.1

nodes.html: • Publishing research from different academic disciplines applied to tourism: economy, marketing, company, geography, heritage, political, sociology, social-psychology, anthropology, law, technology, ecology, etc.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 16.1

nodes.html: • Disseminating multidisciplinary and holistic issues applied to tourism: environment, urbanism, culture, training, management, planning, image, sustainability, innovation, accessibility, sharing economy, social media, networks of actors in tourism, management of the online reputation, etc.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 16.1

nodes.html: • Identifying and deepening new lines of future research: smart destinations, sharing tourism, dark tourism, creative destinations, tourism decreasing, international terrorism in tourism destinations, climatic change, future scenarios, and other innovative topics yet to be discovered.
